name: Gulf State Park Camp Store Penny Press
description: 4‑design hand‑crank penny press located inside the camp store pavilion at Gulf State Park.

name: Gulf Shores Souvenirs & Gifts – Machine 1
description: 4‑die machine near entrance; designs include Octopus, Seahorse/Sun/Starfish, “I Love You”, Dolphins – all labeled 'Gulf Shores, Alabama'.

name: Gulf Shores Souvenirs & Gifts – Machine 2
description: Second 4‑die machine next to the first; includes Shark, Dolphin (Orange Beach), I Love You hearts, Hug & Kiss hearts designs.

name: Robertsdale Store Penny Press
description: Penny press near front of store in Robertsdale, AL.
